title: Radisson Blu Plaza
address: 1 MG Road, Adjacent to Mall of Mysore , Karnataka, India 570010
details: <div>Hotel Policy&nbsp;</div><div>The standard check-in time is 12:00 PM and the standard check-out time is 11:00 AM. Any early check-in or late check-out request must be directed and reconfirmed with hotel directlySpecial Note: There maybe supplementary charges for Xmas and New Year as per hotel policy, kindly pay the supplementary charges directly at the hotel..</div><div><br></div><div>Dining</div><div>Bar / Lounge ,Multi Cuisine Restaurant ,Coffee Shop / Cafe,Kitchen available (home cook food on request),Vegetarian Food / Jain Food Available,Rooftop Garden,Food Facility,RO Water Purification System,Restaurant</div>
